message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a deep learning method for joint estimation of motion and segmentation from cardiac MR image sequences. This involves using a Siamese style recurrent spatial transformer network for motion estimation and a fully convolutional network for segmentation. The paper also discusses the use of weakly-supervised segmentation by taking advantage of features that are unsupervisedly learned in the motion estimation branch. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves optimization and learning, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of MR image sequences suggests that it could belong to cs.MM (Multimedia) and the use of deep learning suggests that it could belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
